name: Monster Hunters: Idle RPG
description:
As a Hunter, your mission is to hunt down all monsters and prevent them from invading our land. But fear not, Hunter, you will be accompanied by a pet to be your powerful sidekick throughout your journey. Discover hundreds of new upgrades, weapons, artifacts and spirits to strengthen your power! Go now and protect our land!

Nonstop & Endless Battle
Monster Hunters: Idle RPG is a Nonstop battle game that you can play while you are working, studying, eating, even sleeping!

Artifacts & Relics
Explore and obtain rare artifacts and relics! Each one of them holds a unique power that will be able to give you wealth and power, enough to turn the tide of battle!

Pets
Raise and upgrade your pet to accompany you! Over a hundred kinds of pets ready to be your sidekick!

Unlimited Upgrades
Discover hundreds of new equipments and upgrades to grow your power and banish those monsters from our land!

Dragon Spirit PVP
Collect hundreds of Dragon Spirits to protect your Altar from harm! Unleash your Dragon Spirits' power and defeat your rival in Monster Hunters: Idle RPG

Thousands of hunters are currently fighting against monsters out there, do you have what it takes to compete and be the best Monster Hunter?
